title: Enhancing Instructional Design Competencies Through Design Thinking and Reflective Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic instructional design models and curriculum development experience
context.additional_context: Learner Role: Students/Job Seekers, Domain Expertise: Advanced, Subject Area: Language, Assessment Method: Project-Based Assessment, Technological Environment: Bring Your Own Device (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can operationalize instructional design strategies to solve ill-structured educational problems by applying the design thinking process.
Learners enhance their reflective practice skills by analyzing their design decisions and professional identity through reflective writing.
Learners demonstrate collaborative abilities by iteratively improving instructional design prototypes based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
